column3: Legend: x (Ignore Bits), X (Bits To Change) MY (Model Year)

column5: THESE MODS ARE ALL USE AT YOUR OWN RISK! - MAKE BACKUPS OF EXISTING DATA BEFORE MAKING CHANGES -
Download Original Vehicle As-Built Data from Ford Server: https://www.motorcraftservice.com/AsBuilt

column3: 01 - AGM 70Ah 600CCA H6 Case - Default (with Start/Stop Engine)
column5: For FORScan Instructions, See This Thead: http://www.2gfusions.net/showthread.php?tid=4573&pid=80488#pid80488
Feel free to leave a post in the thread with something you discovered and wish to have added to this spreadsheet

column3: 12 - Regular/Varta 60Ah 600CCA H5 Case - Default (SE/Titanium with Push to Start)
There are more battery type options, not in this list (23 total to be exact)... Just explore the first two bits.

column4: Note: I recommend disabling BMS if you have an aftermarket stereo system. Especially if your battery charge is consistently low. Alternator always on.

column2: Auto Relock Doors - If Unlocked, Not Opened Within 45 Seconds:

column4: Note: Add 4 to existing hex value at location in IPC to show option in Locks Submenu

column2: Add DRL Control from Instrument Clusters for 2014 Fusions or 2015+ Fleet/Rental Vehicles:
column4: Note: This should also work for similar vehicles with this menu missing... 2015+ F-150, 2015+ Mustang, 2014+ MKZ, 2015+ Edge, 2016+ Explorer, etc...
Note: Additionally, Candian Fusion's 2014-2017 should be able to use this to enable DRL control, as it comes blocked from the factory.
Note: This setting enables all choices in the list for DRL options

column3: 10 (Enabled - DRL Dedicated) - Enables BCM DRL Outputs - C2280C Pins 36 (Right) and 40 (Left)

column4: IPC ABD Change

column3: This one is tricky - need to add a 4 to existing value at X.
column5: Decimal to Hex Conversion: 10 = A, 11 = B, 12 = C, 13 = D, 14 = E, 15 = F

column3: Example: 8+4=12 which is C..... Example: A+4=14 which is E
Use original value for this bit (thus subtract 4 from enabled value)

column4: Possible, Also need to Change X in 726-32-01 xXxx xxxx to a 1.
Note: The 5 Changes (X's) should all be the same number. It sets default for (up to) 4 programmed keyfobs and the current in use setting in the last box
Example: 0303 0303 03** for 15 Minutes
The user controllable setting in the IPC only changes the last box number, which is reset when battery is disconnected/module reset.

column3: FE (Enabled w/Climate Control and Heated Steering Wheel)

column2: Enable OEM Foglights (Added After Vehicle Purchase):
column4: Note: Make both changes (BCM and IPC)
Note: If you already have an existing value at X in the IPC... add 1 to the existing value, do NOT just change it to a 1.

column2: Simultaneous High Beams and Fog Lights (aka Bambi Mode):

column3: 0 (Fog Light Position Remembered on Ignition Cycle)
1 (Fog Light Position NOT Remembered on Ignition Cycle)
1 (High Beam Position Remembered on Igntion Cycle)
0 (High Beam Position NOT Remember on Ignition Cycle)
Note: Mondeo Tail Lights - May have to change entire line to: 0101 0101 015B
Note: Mondeo Tail Lights - May have to change entire line to: 0101 0000 71

column4: Note: Add a "4" to your stock value... i.e. 0=4, 1 = 5,

column2: Panic Alarm Setting for Key Fob:
Disable Door Lock Horn Honk (2x Press on Fob)

column4: Note: This is great to disable horn honk with 3x Lock Remote Starters

column2: Door Close Double Horn Honk (Engine Running Without Keyfob Detected (PTS)):

column4: Note: Doesn't Allow Vehicle To Shift From Park To Drive Without Passive Key Inside Vehicle (Shifter Locked w/No Key Detected Message)
Note: This setting enables all choices in the list for DRL options

column3: 10 (Enabled - DRL Dedicated) - Enables BCM DRL Outputs - C2280C Pins 36 (Right) and 40 (Left)

column4: Note: This setting enables all choices in the list for DRL options

column3: 10 (Enabled - DRL Dedicated) - Enables BCM DRL Outputs - C2280C Pins 36 (Right) and 40 (Left)

column4: Note: IPC Only will NOT have automatic audio mute feature for chimes/warnings (Depending on firmware version)

column3: Subtract an 8 from existing value at X.
column5: Decimal to Hex Conversion: 10 = A, 11 = B, 12 = C, 13 = D, 14 = E, 15 = F

column3: Use original value for this bit (thus add 8 from currently enabled value)

column4: Note: Press Mirror Left or Right Switch before shifting into reverse
Add Hex 4 to Existing Value: 3+4=7

column3: FE (Enabled w/Climate Control and Heated Steering Wheel)

column4: Note: No Blue Sky Background on IPC when getting into vehicle
Removing Hex 8 from Existing Value: C-8=4

column2: Dual Screen Cluster - Right Screen Modifications:

column4: Note: Ignore bits marked with "x"

column3: 1xxx (Removes AM/FM and CD from Entertainment Source List)
xxx0 (Removes Phone Menu and Corresponding Alerts from Right Cluster Screen)
column4: Note: Phone/Text Alerts still come up on 8" Sync2/3 Screen

column3: xx3x (Removes Climate Control Menu from Right Cluster Screen) w/Nav
xx2x (Removes Climate Control Menu from Right Cluster Screen) w/o Nav
column4: Note: You can add an 8 to this value to enable climate control from IPC, if your vehicle came with this menu missing/disabled.

column2: Tire Pressure (TPMS) Gauge (Factory Tire Pressure Value Shown):
column4: Note: This value will be blank (__) if the vehicle BCM software level does not support this feature.
Note: 4" Display does NOT support the "A" option

column3: A (Enabled w/ Side Obstacle Detection - 2017 Fusion Only)

column2: Enable Heated Steering Wheel Vehicle Support (Requires New Steering Wheel and HSWM Module Installed):
column4: Note: Also, HSW needs to be enabled in IPC for Remote Starter and APIM to Turn On/Off when desired
For more details, see this thread: http://www.2gfusions.net/showthread.php?tid=6598

column2: Audio - Enable Equalizer Presets in Sound Menu (Ford Sync 2 (MyFord Touch) Only):
column4: Note: Does NOT work on Ford Sync 3

column2: Audio - Variable Line Level Preamp Output from Speaker Wiring

column4: Note: Connect RCA Wires to Existing Speaker Wire Coming Out of ACM or Before Sony DSP Amplifer (if equipped)
Reference Thread: http://www.2gfusions.net/showthread.php?tid=3704

column3: 59 - Variable Line Level Output w/Subwoofer Aux (Optional)

column2: Audio - Remove Fake Engine Noise (2017 Fusion Sport, 2013+ Hybrid's/Energi, etc.)

column4: Note: Only binary options are 8+4+2+1. Thus if this hex bit already is a 1,4,8,9,C,D then it is disabled from factory

column3: Subtract a 2 from existing value at X.
column5: Decimal to Hex Conversion: 10 = A, 11 = B, 12 = C, 13 = D, 14 = E, 15 = F

column3: Use original value for this bit (thus add 2 from currently enabled value)

column4: Note: Foglight on corresponding side of car illuminates with turn signal/steering wheel input under 40km/ph
Feature standard on European Mondeos WITHOUT LED Adaptive Headlights

column2: Front Turn Signal Bulb Out Detection

column4: Note: Eliminates IPC hyperflash if using LED turn signal bulbs.
Note: For 2013MY, add 1 to the value for the number of flashes desired.
Note: Requires Mondeo style tail lights with rear fog and wiring. North American Fusions lack the lights and the requisite wiring
Note: 2013 - 2014 MY should have this menu enabled from factory

column3: Values can be 0-9, then 10 = A, 11 = B, 12 = C 13 = D and so on.
(Example: if value at X is 9, then 9 + 4 = 13. 13 = D. Change value at X to D)
